title: RoR Developer
description:
Job Summary

  • Location : Indore

  • Project Role : Technical Lead

  • Experience Required : min. 3 years

  • Skills Required : Ruby on Rails, Postgres, AWS.

  • No. of Openings : 10

  • Pay Range : 3 - 8 LPA

Job Description

  • Key Responsibilities

1.To be responsible for providing technical guidance / solutions ;define, advocate, and implement best practices and coding standards for the team.

2.To develop and guide the team members in enhancing their technical capabilities and increasing productivity

3.To ensure process compliance in the assigned module| and participate in technical discussions/review as a technical consultant for feasibility study

4.To prepare and submit status reports for minimizing exposure and risks on the project or closure of escalations.

title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
description:
Job Summary

  • Location : Banglore

  • Job Type : Hybrid

  • Experience Required : min. 5 Years

  • Skills : Project/Program Management, preferably having exposure managing mid-size.

  • Project Role : Senior Program Manager

  • No. of Openings : 5

  • Pay Range : 7 - 10 LPA

Job Description :

About Infokoders

Infokoders is a global technology company, spread across 60 countries, delivering industry-leading capabilities centered around digital, engineering, cloud and AI, powered by a broad portfolio of technology services and products. We work with clients across all major verticals, providing industry solutions for Financial Services, Manufacturing, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Technology and Services, Telecom and Media, Retail and CPG, and Public Services. We are powered by our people a global, diverse, multi-generational talent - representing 161 nationalities whose unique spark, perspective and boundless passion drive our culture of proactive value creation and problem-solving.
Our purpose is to bring together the best of technology and our people to supercharge progress for everyone, everywhere our clients, partners, their stakeholders.

Key Responsibilities

  • To build strong relationships with key Program Partners / Stakeholders and manage their interests for smooth integration and implementation of the program and achievement of its objectives.

  • To optimize engagement profitability, strategically managing diverse variables, pinpointing improvement opportunities, and implementing targeted strategies to elevate overall project profitability.

  • To proactively identify, assess, and address risks, issues, and escalations by developing robust mitigation and contingency plans, ensuring seamless program delivery.

title: UI/UX Designer
description:
Job Summary

  • Location : Pune

  • Job Type : Full-time

  • Experience Required : min. 1+ Years

  • Skills : Proficiency in design tools like Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch, or similar.

  • No. of Openings : 2

  • Pay Range : 2 - 5 LPA

Job Description :

We’re seeking a creative and detail-oriented UI/UX Designer to join our team. You’ll be responsible for crafting intuitive, engaging, and beautiful user experiences — from wireframes to high-fidelity designs — ensuring our products are both functional and visually appealing. The ideal candidate has a passion for user-centered design, an eye for aesthetics, and a knack for problem-solving.

Key Responsibilities :

1. User Research & Analysis : Conduct user research, gather insights, and analyze user behavior to inform design decisions.

2. Wireframing & Prototyping : Create wireframes, prototypes, and user flows that clearly illustrate how products function and look.

3. Visual Design : Develop high-fidelity UI designs, including typography, color schemes, iconography, and layout.

4. Design Systems : Maintain and enhance design systems, ensuring consistency across all products.

5. Usability Testing : Conduct user testing, analyze feedback, and iterate on designs to continuously improve the user experience.
